item.title: FRUGAL BUSINESS: HubSpot Academy Inbound Certification Notes: Part 1
item.description:
FRUGAL BUSINESS: HubSpot Academy Inbound Certification Notes: Part 1

HubSpot is obviously one of the most popular and rapidly growing digital marketing software companies out there. I am a big fan because of their Inbound Marketing expertise and their Boston roots. I've been an inbound marketer since 2009 because I would much rather educate a prospect than force traditional marketing methods down their throats.

item.title: Facebook Website Custom Audiences: A Definitive Guide for Remarketing
item.description:
Facebook Website Custom Audiences: A Definitive Guide for Remarketing

For more on the upgraded Website Custom Audience pixel, read this post.] The power of Facebook ads is found within the targeting. I don't care how perfect the ad copy, imagery, bidding and optimization are, it's imperative that you target the people most likely to perform your desired action.

item.title: An Algorithm Based Timeline is Coming to Instagram
item.description:
An Algorithm Based Timeline is Coming to Instagram

The Instagram timeline is about to change in a huge was as an algorithmic news feed is in testing.

item.title: Using content to convert in e-commerce
item.description:
Using content to convert in e-commerce

Published on March 21, 2016 by E-commerce doesn't work unless it goes side by side with great content. You may have heard about "content-driven commerce websites", "e-commerce content marketing" and "the fusion of content and commerce". Well, it all comes down to the same thing.

item.title: 5 Growth Hacks to Help You Grow Your Blog Business
item.description:
5 Growth Hacks to Help You Grow Your Blog Business

" One of the most misleading perspectives of a dinosaur's history is the one that effectively proves that this creature was unintelligible and inhumane and therefore faced a grave threat to its existence and continuance, ever since the pre-Jurassic period.

item.title: How Social Media & Content Marketing Work Together
item.description:
How Social Media & Content Marketing Work Together

I think most marketers would agree that social media and content marketing compliment each other nicely. Need proof? Recent research has found that 93% of B2B marketers list social media as one of their top five content marketing tactics. I like to think of social media as the vehicle that drives your content where you want it to go.

item.title: Ways to Integrate SEO and Social Media to Improve Site Ranking
item.description:
Ways to Integrate SEO and Social Media to Improve Site Ranking

For years, SEO has been about optimizing the content on websites and pushing it to other external sites. However, as people started using social media more, search engine algorithms came up with new ways of ranking sites by taking how modern marketers share and rate content into consideration.

item.title: How real businesses are using machine learning
item.description:
How real businesses are using machine learning

There is no question that machine learning is at the top of the hype curve. And, of course, the backlash is already in full force: I've heard that old joke "Machine learning is like teenage sex; everyone is talking about it, no one is actually doing it" about 20 times in the past week alone.

item.title: Is Your SEO Strategy Future-Proof? Here are 5 Ways to Tell
item.description:
Is Your SEO Strategy Future-Proof? Here are 5 Ways to Tell

When it comes to predicting the future, the SEO industry is a speculative, sometimes tumultuous territory. Search engines, like most other technologies, evolve rapidly, and consumer preferences evolve in tandem.
